title: Tips for the Talon Update
body:
I mained Talon before the update, but I just cant seem to find success with him post update and am looking for tips.

I think I am supposed to be trying to land both hits of my W then Q AA for the passive proc, but they usually just walk back towards my turret and out of the second hit of my W. If they do get hit by it I cant usually get in range of Q before the slow wears off so they get away.

When I gank people I usually walk into range (or flip over a wall), throw W, miss the second hit because they walk out of it or use a movement ability, then I leave or die. I can sometimes kill them with ult if they let me walk into range for the first hit and arent under turret by the time I can cast Q because of the delay, and even then I usually die before I can AA them for the passive proc.

Farming is easier making build paths broader since I dont have to rush tiamat every game,  which is helping a bit.

I feel like the most useful thing I have done since the rework is sweep wards with the new duskblade XD
